description:
You never know when you need to strap something together. These versatile straps are tough and stretchy for securing whatever you can think of. Strap dry bags to your bike, secure things to your roof rack, or hold bulging bins closed; they're seriously great for anything.

  • Stretchy TPU is grippy to prevent slipping
  • Non-slip buckle is easy to lock in place and holds excess strap flat
  • Keeper strap allows you to lash items together
  • Straps join together to increase length
name: Sea To Summit Stretch-Loc TPU Straps - 4 Pack
